channel.title: Official Moparscape RSC Server FAQs
channel.description:
ask a question and ill try and add it to this list.
[b]Q: Who is the team behind this server??[/b]
A: Well, moparisthebest has appointed me to run it, he will be dealing a lot with the server setup behind the scenes, security, sql, hosting and other related things. I will be looking around for moderators, developers and anyone else i feel would be a good addition to the team.
Since i won't be spending as much time on this as i did with RSCA, i'm not making any profit here not do i expect to, i have a full time job and i'm also planning on actively playing this server, therefore i'm looking for quite a lot of other developers to help deal with maintaining the server. They won't have any access to the dedicated server behind it, nor will be able to commit updates, all code will be ran through me and then added.
Since i have been around this community a long time, i know who's great for development and moderator positions, i have already picked quite a few people which i will make a thread about soon listing who they are.
[b]Q: when will the server launch?[/b]
A: i can't say exactly, im hoping within a week to get an open beta up, possibly a few weeks from now for a launch. lot of things to work out first.
[b]Q: What is the name of the server?[/b]
A: Moparscape Classic (MSC)

item.title: Official Moparscape RSC Server FAQs
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Gety4some, post:42, topic:392657”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=489830.msg3585250#msg3585250 date=1304126160]
If no one wants to beta test, so be it. Don’t worry about the beta test, it’s useless.
[/quote]

Many of us are happy to do the beta testing. You just can’t honestly expect us to do it at a 4x rate. Why in the hell would we grind/waste days to test things if the level are just going to be wiped. Either set the rate really high or implement the setstat command so we can test out things like ranging, pve combat, pvp combat , ect.[/quote]
No one ever said there wouldnt be some sort of setstat option… thats how testing was done on rsca, but all people did was spawn shit and max flats pk.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Moparscape RSC Server FAQs
item.dc:creator: @Yoshie Yoshie
item.description:
@Yoshie wrote:

Seek:

Yoshie, you said that the Beta would last a few days. If I know anything, I would have to think it would last at least a week or 2 at the least… What bugs could anyone possibly find in a few days?

I agree, but I’m just basing it on what I’ve read from his posts. Perhaps it will be extended, perhaps not. If people run into dozens of bugs in the first few hours, obviously they will begin rethinking the length of the beta. If after two or three days, only a handful are found, then there probably aren’t enough flaws to make the server incapable of functioning.

In other words, if it seems to run smoothly enough, then after the server is officially up and running, the random bugs we miss can be fixed without having to reset everything afterwards.

The biggest things to worry about in the beta, assuming the above statement is applied, are bugs involving leveling, stats, and items. Broken quests, NPCs, or skills can be remedied without having to worry too much about resetting players’ items or stats. If someone finds a way of duplicating items, getting infinite gold, or getting 100k experience per kill, etc. then it’s going to be a big issue that might result in a rollback or reset.

If we, as beta testers, actually do what the title implies, the server will likely be up and running within no time, without too many issues.

Read full topic

item.title: Official Moparscape RSC Server FAQs
item.dc:creator: @Yoshie Yoshie
item.description:
@Yoshie wrote:

Generally speaking, the purpose of a beta is to find bugs and whatnot. I understand that he doesn’t want people getting used to 60x experience and getting stuck back at 4x later, but at 4x and only a few days, people will only be able to test out lower level things, leaving the potential for a lot of obvious high level bugs after the beta. A quick jump to 80+ smithing, strength or defense, ranged, cooking, and so on will give people a chance to make sure there aren’t any ridiculous flaws overlooked.

I also believe that the people beta testing this server will be far more annoyed at a reset if they have to spend hours getting their stats up, versus spending a short while and then having to deal with the lowered experience rates. Everyone here is, more or less, an adult now. They know what they’re getting into when they see “beta” written all over the place along with you stating and restating that it will be reset. If they complain about the drop in rates or reset, they clearly didn’t pay attention in the first place.

Aim for a fast experience beta so people can actually “beta test” instead of giving up after an hour or two, knowing in the end their efforts will be reset anyway.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Gety4some Gety4some
item.description:
@Gety4some wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Are people really arguing over how the (short) beta is going to be set up? What does it matter? No one should care about that, since it will only last a few days at most.

No…
we were arguing over having set stats or a 4x rate. I honestly think that people will log on for an hour or two to fuck about and get bored of wasting their time since they know it will all be wiped.
